definitions.text: the vertical force exerted by a mass as a result of gravity
sports equipment used in calisthenic exercises and weightlifting; it is not attached to anything and is raised and lowered by use of the hands and arms
the relative importance granted to something
examples: the progression implied an increasing weightiness of the items listed

definitions.text: an oppressive feeling of heavy force
examples: bowed down by the weight of responsibility

definitions.text: a system of units used to express the weight of something
a unit used to measure weight
examples: he placed two weights in the scale pan

definitions.text: (statistics) a coefficient assigned to elements of a frequency distribution in order to represent their relative importance

examples: He biased his presentation so as to please the share holders
